name: HappyBear
description: Happy will provide fast, efficient and competitive utilities that will benefit traders foremost, while also raising funds for impactful causes through The Giving Block. Happy Swap: Happy Swap is the first multi-charity, multi-chain DEX aggregator where you choose which charity your swap fee goes towards. Fast, efficient, altruistic and scalable. Happy Swap V2's features will include limit orders which will allow you to secure profit and protect your investment even while you sleep. 0.0035 ETH flat fee (66% to charity, 33% to buyback of HAPPY token. More details on V2 utilities please refer to the attached pitchdeck. (Highly confidential)
